To that end, to be considered acceptable, tall building proposals must meet or exceed the 40% affordable housing target for the borough, and provide a suitable mix of unit sizes, including family homes, to meet the identified needs of the borough. In relation to affordable housing, proposals should also meet the tenure mix requiring 85% social rented housing and 15% intermediate housing.
